  prototype={<>static MachineBasicBlock &#42; tryToSplitRestore (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; MBB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; DirtyPreds, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &#42; TII)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
This function splits the restore point and returns new restore point/BB.

DirtyPreds: Predessors of <code>MBB</code> that are ReachableByDirty

Decision has been made to split the restore point. old restore point: <code>MBB</code> new restore point: <code>NMBB</code> This function makes the necessary block layout changes so that
<ul>
<li><code>NMBB</code> points to <code>MBB</code> unconditionally</li>
<li>All dirtyPreds that previously pointed to <code>MBB</code> point to <code>NMBB</code></li>
</ul>

### updateTerminator() {#a0d669f3a4d6e865cc9d89c43e230976f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>static void updateTerminator (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; BBToUpdate, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; NMBB, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetinstrinfo">TargetInstrInfo</a> &#42; TII)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
This function updates the branches post restore point split.

Restore point has been split. Old restore point: MBB New restore point: NMBB <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/any">Any</a> basic <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/transforms/lib/transforms/utils/unifyloopexits-cpp/#a4741a07a0e5675f89cfed122008e0a76">block(say BBToUpdate)</a> which had a fallthrough to MBB previously should
<ul>
<li>Fallthrough to NMBB iff NMBB is inserted immediately above MBB in the block layout OR</li>
<li>Branch unconditionally to NMBB iff NMBB is inserted at any other place.</li>
</ul>

<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass looks for safe point where the prologue and epilogue can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// inserted.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The safe point for the prologue (resp. epilogue) is called Save</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// (resp. Restore).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A point is safe for prologue (resp. epilogue) if and only if</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// it 1) dominates (resp. post-dominates) all the frame related operations and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// between 2) two executions of the Save (resp. Restore) point there is an</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// execution of the Restore (resp. Save) point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For instance, the following points are safe:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for (int i = 0; i &lt; 10; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Save</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Restore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Indeed, the execution looks like Save -&gt; Restore -&gt; Save -&gt; Restore ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// And the following points are not:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for (int i = 0; i &lt; 10; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Save</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for (int i = 0; i &lt; 10; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   ...</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   Restore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Indeed, the execution looks like Save -&gt; Save -&gt; ... -&gt; Restore -&gt; Restore.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This pass also ensures that the safe points are 3) cheaper than the regular</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// entry and exits blocks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Property #1 is ensured via the use of MachineDominatorTree and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MachinePostDominatorTree.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Property #2 is ensured via property #1 and MachineLoopInfo, i.e., both</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// points must be in the same loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Property #3 is ensured via the MachineBlockFrequencyInfo.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this pass found points matching all these properties, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MachineFrameInfo is updated with this information.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-shrinkwrap-cpp-"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">namespace </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Class to determine where the safe point to insert the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// prologue and epilogue are.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Unlike the paper from Fred C. Chow, PLDI&#39;88, that introduces the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// shrink-wrapping term for prologue/epilogue placement, this pass</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// does not rely on expensive data-flow analysis. Instead we use the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// dominance properties and loop information to decide which point</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    bool UseOrDefCSR = false;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">    if (MO.isReg()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Ignore instructions like DBG&#95;VALUE which don&#39;t read/def the register.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">      if (!MO.isDef() &amp;&amp; !MO.readsReg())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">        continue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Register PhysReg = MO.getReg();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">      if (!PhysReg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">        continue;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><span class="doxyHighlight">      assert(PhysReg.isPhysical() &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unallocated register?!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The stack pointer is not normally described as a callee-saved register</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in calling convention definitions, so we need to watch for it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// separately. An SP mentioned by a call instruction, we can ignore,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// though, as it&#39;s harmless and we do not want to effectively disable tail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calls by forcing the restore point to post-dominate them.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// PPC&#39;s LR is also not normally described as a callee-saved register in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// calling convention definitions, so we need to watch for it, too. An LR</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mentioned implicitly by a return (or &quot;branch to link register&quot;)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// instruction we can ignore, otherwise we may pessimize shrinkwrapping.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">      UseOrDefCSR =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (!MI.isCall() &amp;&amp; PhysReg == SP) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">          RCI.getLastCalleeSavedAlias(PhysReg) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><span class="doxyHighlight">          (!MI.isReturn() &amp;&amp; TRI-&gt;isNonallocatableRegisterCalleeSave(PhysReg));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/passes/passbuilderbindings-cpp/#acdfbcf188e2d4a80837e89de2ccdffab">if</a> (MO.isRegMask()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if this regmask clobbers any of the CSRs.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">      for (unsigned Reg : getCurrentCSRs(RS)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">        if (MO.clobbersPhysReg(Reg)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">          UseOrDefCSR = true;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">          break;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Skip FrameIndex operands in DBG&#95;VALUE instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (UseOrDefCSR || (MO.isFI() &amp;&amp; !<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>.isDebugValue())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><span class="doxyHighlight">      LLVM&#95;DEBUG(dbgs() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Use or define CSR(&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; UseOrDefCSR &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;) or FI(&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">                        &lt;&lt; MO.isFI() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;): &quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &lt;&lt; MI &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&#39;\\n&#39;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">      return true;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;IDom = Dom.findNearestCommonDominator(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9b5301a03dc90d7ac00440e2de4d9149">iterator&#95;range</a>(BBs));</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="#a5aa69466ef430dc4ba4de70307ae4415">rollbackRestoreSplit</a>(MF, NewRestore, InitRestore, DirtyPreds, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/hexagoncopytocombine-cpp/#a1d40004718218dbdf06b496766299101">TII</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Save = NewSave;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">  Restore = NewRestore;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">  MDT-&gt;recalculate(MF);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((!MLI-&gt;getLoopFor(Save) &amp;&amp; !MLI-&gt;getLoopFor(Restore)) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>((EntryFreq &gt;= MBFI-&gt;getBlockFreq(Save) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShrinkWrap::updateSaveRestorePoints(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                         <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/regscavenger">RegScavenger</a> &#42;RS) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Get rid of the easy cases first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Save)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Save = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Save = MDT-&gt;findNearestCommonDominator(Save, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Save);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Restore)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Restore = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MPDT-&gt;getNode(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>)) </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the block is not in the post dom tree, it</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// means the block never returns. If that&#39;s the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// case, we don&#39;t want to call</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#96;findNearestCommonDominator&#96;, which will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// return &#96;Restore&#96;.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Restore = MPDT-&gt;findNearestCommonDominator(Restore, &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Restore = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Abort, we can&#39;t find a restore point in this case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure we would be able to insert the restore code before the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// terminator.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Restore == &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;Terminator : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.terminators()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!useOrDefCSROrFI(Terminator, RS, </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/&#42;StackAddressUsed=&#42;/</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// One of the terminator needs to happen before the restore point.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>.succ&#95;empty()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Restore = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Abort, we can&#39;t find a restore point in this case.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for a restore point that post-dominates all the successors.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The immediate post-dominator is what we are looking for.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Restore = <a href="#afd8051d902a31225cb798a74ff507530">FindIDom&lt;&gt;</a>(&#42;Restore, Restore-&gt;successors(), &#42;MPDT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Restore) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Restore point needs to be spanned on several blocks\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure Save and Restore are suitable for shrink-wrapping:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 all path from Save needs to lead to Restore before exiting.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 all path to Restore needs to go through Save from Entry.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We achieve that by making sure that:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// A. Save dominates Restore.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// B. Restore post-dominates Save.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// C. Save and Restore are in the same loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> SaveDominatesRestore = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RestorePostDominatesSave = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">while</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Restore &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><span class="doxyHighlight">         (!(SaveDominatesRestore = MDT-&gt;dominates(Save, Restore)) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">          !(RestorePostDominatesSave = MPDT-&gt;dominates(Restore, Save)) ||</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Post-dominance is not enough in loops to ensure that all uses/defs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are after the prologue and before the epilogue at runtime.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// E.g.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// while(1) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Save</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  Restore</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   if (...)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//     break;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//  use/def CSRs</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// All the uses/defs of CSRs are dominated by Save and post-dominated</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// by Restore. However, the CSRs uses are still reachable after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Restore and before Save are executed.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For now, just push the restore/save points outside of loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// FIXME: Refine the criteria to still find interesting cases</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for loops.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><span class="doxyHighlight">          MLI-&gt;getLoopFor(Save) || MLI-&gt;getLoopFor(Restore))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fix (A).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!SaveDominatesRestore) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Save = MDT-&gt;findNearestCommonDominator(Save, Restore);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fix (B).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!RestorePostDominatesSave)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Restore = MPDT-&gt;findNearestCommonDominator(Restore, Save);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Fix (C).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Restore &amp;&amp; (MLI-&gt;getLoopFor(Save) || MLI-&gt;getLoopFor(Restore))) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MLI-&gt;getLoopDepth(Save) &gt; MLI-&gt;getLoopDepth(Restore)) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Push Save outside of this loop if immediate dominator is different</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// from save block. If immediate dominator is not different, bail out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><span class="doxyHighlight">        Save = <a href="#afd8051d902a31225cb798a74ff507530">FindIDom&lt;&gt;</a>(&#42;Save, Save-&gt;predecessors(), &#42;MDT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!Save)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the loop does not exit, there is no point in looking</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// for a post-dominator outside the loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;MachineBasicBlock&#42;, 4&gt;</a> ExitBlocks;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MLI-&gt;getLoopFor(Restore)-&gt;getExitingBlocks(ExitBlocks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Push Restore outside of this loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for the immediate post-dominator of the loop exits.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;IPdom = Restore;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;LoopExitBB: ExitBlocks) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><span class="doxyHighlight">          IPdom = <a href="#afd8051d902a31225cb798a74ff507530">FindIDom&lt;&gt;</a>(&#42;IPdom, LoopExitBB-&gt;successors(), &#42;MPDT);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!IPdom)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the immediate post-dominator is not in a less nested loop,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// then we are stuck in a program with an infinite loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// In that case, we will not find a safe point, hence, bail out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (IPdom &amp;&amp; MLI-&gt;getLoopDepth(IPdom) &lt; MLI-&gt;getLoopDepth(Restore))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Restore = IPdom;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Restore = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">nullptr</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;isEHPad() || <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;isInlineAsmBrIndirectTarget()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Push the prologue and epilogue outside of the region that may throw (or</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// jump out via inlineasm&#95;br), by making sure that all the landing pads</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are at least at the boundary of the save and restore points.  The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// problem is that a basic block can jump out from the middle in these</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><span class="doxyHighlight">      updateSaveRestorePoints(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, RS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ArePointsInteresting()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;EHPad/inlineasm&#95;br prevents shrink-wrapping\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">continue</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> StackAddressUsed = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Check if we found any stack accesses in the predecessors. We are not</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// doing a full dataflow analysis here to keep things simple but just</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// rely on a reverse portorder traversal (RPOT) to guarantee predecessors</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// are already processed except for loops (and accept the conservative</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// result for loops).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;Pred : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;predecessors()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (StackAddressUsedBlockInfo.test(Pred-&gt;getNumber())) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><span class="doxyHighlight">        StackAddressUsed = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">break</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a> : &#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Save (resp. restore) point must dominate (resp. post dominate)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// MI. Look for the proper basic block for those.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><span class="doxyHighlight">        updateSaveRestorePoints(&#42;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>, RS);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we are at a point where we cannot improve the placement of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// save/restore instructions, just give up.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ArePointsInteresting()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><span class="doxyHighlight">          <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;No Shrink wrap candidate found\\n&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><span class="doxyHighlight">          </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><span class="doxyHighlight">        &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// No need to look for other instructions, this basic block</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// will already be part of the handled region.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><span class="doxyHighlight">        StackAddressUsed = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><span class="doxyHighlight">    StackAddressUsedBlockInfo&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a>-&gt;getNumber()&#93; = StackAddressUsed;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!ArePointsInteresting()) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the points are not interesting at this point, then they must be null</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// because it means we did not encounter any frame/CSR related code.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, we would have returned from the previous loop.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!Save &amp;&amp; !Restore &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;We miss a shrink-wrap opportunity?!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering">TargetFrameLowering</a> &#42;TFI =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MachineFunc-&gt;getSubtarget().getFrameLowering();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">do</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Shrink wrap candidates (#, Name, Freq):\\nSave: &quot;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IsSaveCheap, TargetCanUseSaveAsPrologue = </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/cl/#a9241f2e42b7587b123c885d7a659ad44aa5bd521ebe67ddf0e90f1a9e540a6d43">cl::BOU&#95;UNSET</a>:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TFI-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetframelowering/#a387a4e975fc47abc5b66b4d5379521f0">enableShrinkWrapping</a>(MF) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Windows with CFI has some limitations that make it impossible</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// to use shrink-wrapping.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><span class="doxyHighlight">           !MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#af777ff93c9e07a6ff5ffe3226deb3e76">getTarget</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/targetmachine/#afb72c5626afbc815284e2b26bb0663f8">getMCAsmInfo</a>()-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mcasminfo/#ac158349781823fe8ff9e02d3a3533d55">usesWindowsCFI</a>() &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Sanitizers look at the value of the stack at the location</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of the crash. Since a crash can happen anywhere, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// frame must be lowered before anything else happen for the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><span class="doxyHighlight">           </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// sanitizers to be able to get a correct stack frame.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><span class="doxyHighlight">           !(MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a977ddce262de45c645be23d951066351">getFunction</a>().hasFnAttribute(Attribute::SanitizeAddress) ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><span class="doxyHighlight">             MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a977ddce262de45c645be23d951066351">getFunction</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#afb28a4deafe2954b0534cc6399ce518b">hasFnAttribute</a>(Attribute::SanitizeMemory) ||</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><span class="doxyHighlight">             MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a977ddce262de45c645be23d951066351">getFunction</a>().<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/function/#afb28a4deafe2954b0534cc6399ce518b">hasFnAttribute</a>(Attribute::SanitizeHWAddress));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If EnableShrinkWrap is set, it takes precedence on whatever the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// target sets. The rational is that we assume we want to test</span></CodeLine>
